N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 4-2.6 - Recordkeeping

State Regulations
A covered facility shall maintain the environmental assessment required by section
4-2.3
and the sampling and management plan required by section
4-2.4
of this Subpart, and any associated sampling results, on the facility premises for at least three years. Such records shall be made available to the department immediately upon request. Notes
